name: Ann - Variety Mod
description:
Oh look, it's a mod of a very popular RPG Maker Horror Game. I dedicated 3 weeks on modding this, but okay then.  Anyways, a girl by the name of Ann visits her school campus to try and get her usb drive she left in her classroom. All of a sudden, it becomes spooky and very much haunted (oh noes). So now she has to go through the labyrinth filled with haunted beings. Will she escape? Why is this called a Variety Mod? I dunno. Find out when you play this mod thing game, I guess. Hope you enjoy.

Also, if you want to support the original game, click here: Ann by RongRong (itch.io)
